overview: A new documentary play crafted from firsthand interviews with New York City medical first responders during the COVID-19 pandemic. The Line cuts through the media and political noise to reveal the lived experiences of frontline medical workers in New York and their battle to save lives in a system built to serve the bottom line.

production_companies.name: The Public Theater (Oskar Eustis, Artistic Director; Patrick Willingham, Executive Director)

tagline: examining the fault lines in our system through the words of the brave people who show up every day to care for us all
title: The Line
